WorkItem.ClosedComment: Working as intended.The item you referenced by no means competes for BIS. Should only be rolled on by a Paladin if no one else wants it. Going to try to add an option to the option panel, since its possible to get into that situation (most commonly when you are undergeared compared to the rest of your raid).
WorkItem.Description:
From http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=58824
 
Although items with spirit might not be ideal for Healadins, it shouldn't be a reason why it isn't shown at all. In particular "Runescribed Blade" isn't showing up, but competes for Best in Slot.
 
I think it has to do with the fact that spellpower and crit rating are maybe stats and not wanted stats.
WorkItem.Summary: [Healadin] Doesn't consider items that have Spirit relevant
